caption.center: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Oscar F. SHARP, Appellant.

opinion.posture: Appeal No. 76 May Term 1979, from the Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of York County, Criminal Division, at No. 255 C.A. 1976, Erb, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Judson E. Ruch, Craley, for appellant.
John C. Uhler, Dist. Atty., Richard H. Horn, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
opinion.panel: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O'BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
